algorithm:
New Algorithm Description: The new algorithm scores the bins based on their rest capacity and the item size, adjusts the scores to ensure self-consistency, and assigns additional bonus scores based on the logarithm of the rest capacity of each bin.

New Algorithm Code:

```
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item: int, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    scaling_factor = 0.5
    
    # Calculate the absolute difference between the rest capacity and the item size
    capacity_diff = np.abs(bins - item)
    
    # Calculate the combined score by multiplying the capacity difference with a scaling factor
    combined_score = scaling_factor * capacity_diff
    
    # Adjust the scores using the combined score
    adjusted_scores = 1 / combined_score

    # Normalize the adjusted scores to ensure self-consistency
    normalized_scores = adjusted_scores / np.sum(adjusted_scores)

    # Calculate the logarithm of the rest capacity of each bin and assign bonus scores
    bonus_scores = np.log(bins)

    # Normalize the bonus scores to ensure self-consistency
    normalized_bonus_scores = bonus_scores / np.sum(bonus_scores)

    # Combine the normalized scores and normalized bonus scores
    scores = normalized_scores + normalized_bonus_scores

    return scores
